mapper.select: SELECT c.id,c.username,c.account_type as accountType,c.name, c.city_id as cityId,c.types,date_format(c.last_logined_at,'%Y-%c-%d') as lastLoginedAt, c.integral as integral,c.status,c.device_code as deviceCode, date_format(c.created_at,'%Y-%c-%d') as createdAt,date_format(c.updated_at,'%Y-%c-%d') as updatedAt, c.phone,c.email ,c.types,a.id as agentId,a.parent_id,a.is_have_profit FROM customers c LEFT JOIN agents a ON a.customer_id = c.id WHERE c.username=#{username} and c.password=#{password} and c.types in (#{types},#{statusEnd}) and c.status=#{status}
mapper.update: UPDATE customers set last_logined_at=now() WHERE username=#{username}
